docTitle.titlePart:
GROMOV – WITTEN INVARIANTS AND QUANTIZATION OF
QUADRATIC HAMILTONIANS

front.div:
Abstract. We describe a formalism based on quantization of quadratic hamil-
tonians and symplectic actions of loop groups which provides a convenient
home for most of known general results and conjectures about Gromov-Witten
invariants of compact symplectic manifolds and, more generally, Frobenius
structures at higher genus. We state several results illustrating the formalism
and its use. In particular, we establish Virasoro constraints for semisimple
Frobenius structures and outline a proof of the Virasoro conjecture for Gro-
mov – Witten invariants of complex projective spaces and other Fano toric
manifolds. Details will be published elsewhere.
front.note: Date: April 12, 2001, revised on July 15 and August 14, 2001.
Research partially supported by NSF Grant DMS-0072658.
